Welcome.comment: If you have any claims or wishes regarding the quality of goods or services, please leave a review. All messages will be forwarded to the management.

Form.title: Leave a feedback
Form.description: Multiple answers options can be selected

SIGN_IN_REQUEST.DESCRIPTION: Leave your phone number so that if necessary we can contact you
SIGN_IN_REQUEST.WARNING: By clicking the button, you consent to the processing of personal data and agree to the privacy policy
SIGN_IN_REQUEST.LINK: Leave a review without a phone number

SIGN_IN_VERIFY.DESCRIPTION: We will send you a one-time verification code to verify your number
SIGN_IN_VERIFY.QUESTION: Didn't receive the code?
SIGN_IN_VERIFY.REQUEST_CONFIRM_CODE: You can send the code again in 60 seconds
